definition:
A scheme or algorithm used to embed HiddenPayload into a CoverMedium
   (e.g. LSB image embedding, text perturbations, watermarking).
opposite_reasoning: DetectionScheme provides the strongest functional opposition to EmbeddingScheme in the steganography/watermarking domain. For AI safety monitoring, distinguishing between techniques that hide information (potentially deceptive) versus techniques that reveal hidden information (alignment-positive) is crucial. This pairing creates a semantically meaningful axis for Fisher-LDA: embedding (concealment-oriented) vs. detection (revelation-oriented). While not in standard ontologies, this is a well-understood complementary pair in information security and should be added to layers for robust AI safety concept monitoring.
